description: Abana bagomba kurindwa imirimo ivunanye y’uburyo bumwe n’ubundi yaba-viramo ingaruka mbi ku buzima bwabo harimo kutiga, gukoreshwa imirimo y’agahato, n’ibindi byatuma badakura neza kandi mu mundendezo.
title: Abana bagomba kurindwa imirimo ivunanye y’uburyo bumwe n’ubundi yaba-viramo ingaruka mbi ku buzima bwabo harimo kutiga, gukoreshwa imirimo y’agahato, n’ibindi byatuma badakura neza kandi mu mundendezo
content: Abana bagomba kurindwa imirimo ivunanye y’uburyo bumwe n’ubundi yaba-viramo ingaruka mbi ku buzima bwabo harimo kutiga, gukoreshwa imirimo y’agahato, n’ibindi byatuma badakura neza kandi mu mundendezo.
